meanings.definition: The act of reciprocating or exchanging
meanings.sent1: Their reciprocations of gifts showed their mutual respect.
meanings.sent2: In a friendship, reciprocations of kindness are important.
meanings.sent3: The reciprocations of jokes between friends kept them laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her reciprocations of smiles lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The reciprocations of favors made their bond stronger.

meanings.definition: The state of being reciprocal or mutual
meanings.sent1: The reciprocations of love between them were evident to all.
meanings.sent2: Mutual respect is built on reciprocations of understanding.
meanings.sent3: The reciprocations of laughter in the room were contagious.
meanings.sent4: Their reciprocations of trust formed an unbreakable bond.
meanings.sent5: The reciprocations of support made them feel united.
